title: Paul Pogba says it was 'magic' to play his brother as Florentin shows off bizarre family-themed shin pad
text:
Paul pipped Florentin at Old Trafford (Photo: Getty Images) Share Get   Thank you for subscribing!   
Paul Pogba described playing his brother as 'something magic' following Manchester United's 3-0 win over St Etienne in the Europa League last-32 first leg. 
The Red Devils midfielder went toe-to-toe with his older brother Florentin for the first time in his career and the 
"It was something magic," said the France midfielder. "I just couldn't believe it when I saw him. He started laughing and said just enjoy the moment, be happy. 
"It doesn't happen every day so I just enjoyed it a lot." 
The pair hugged before and exchanged words before and after the game and following the final whistle Florentin revealed his bizarre family-themed shin pads that featured all three of the footballing Pogba brothers - himself, Paul and Mathias, who plays for Sparta Rotterdam. The shin pad features all three Pogba brothers (Photo: AFP) The two brothers had never played each other before (Photo: REUTERS) 
The Â£89million man was pleased with the result, which leaves Manchester United as overwhelming favourites to progress. 
"It was good. We wanted to win. We wanted to score goals and we did so it will be easier for us in the next game but the game is not finished, we have to finish it at St Etienne."
